name: Wikipedia Artificial Intelligence Article Page Test Plan
description: Verify the search functionality on Wikipedia and validate the content, images, infobox, and layout of the Artificial Intelligence article page.
requirements: ['Navigate to the Wikipedia homepage.', 'Enter the term “artificial intelligence” into the search field.', 'Submit the search by pressing the Enter key.', 'Validate that the browser navigates to the “Artificial intelligence” article page.', 'On the article page, verify the presence of all major sections, including but not limited to History, Applications, and Ethics.', 'Confirm that at least one illustrative image is displayed within the article content.', 'Confirm that a useful information box (infobox) appears, summarizing key details about Artificial Intelligence.', 'Assess the overall layout and styling of the article to ensure it looks professional and well-organized.']

action_instruction.expected_outcome: The Wikipedia homepage loads and displays the central search input field.

steps.description: Enter the search term into the Wikipedia search field

action_instruction.description: Enter the search term into the Wikipedia search field
action_instruction.target: Search input field on the Wikipedia homepage
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The text “artificial intelligence” appears in the search input field.

steps.description: Submit the search by pressing the Enter key

action_instruction.description: Submit the search by pressing the Enter key
action_instruction.target: Search input field on the Wikipedia homepage
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The browser navigates to the article page for “Artificial intelligence.”

steps.description: Verify the article page title is “Artificial intelligence”

action_instruction.description: Verify the article page title is “Artificial intelligence”
action_instruction.target: Page heading at top of article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A heading with the exact text “Artificial intelligence” is displayed at the top of the page.

steps.description: Verify the presence of the “History” section

action_instruction.description: Verify the presence of the “History” section
action_instruction.target: Section heading named “History” in the article content
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A section heading “History” is visible within the article body.

steps.description: Verify the presence of the “Applications” section

action_instruction.description: Verify the presence of the “Applications” section
action_instruction.target: Section heading named “Applications” in the article content
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A section heading “Applications” is visible within the article body.

steps.description: Verify the presence of the “Ethics” section

action_instruction.description: Verify the presence of the “Ethics” section
action_instruction.target: Section heading named “Ethics” in the article content
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A section heading “Ethics” is visible within the article body.

steps.description: Confirm at least one illustrative image is displayed in the article content

action_instruction.description: Confirm at least one illustrative image is displayed in the article content
action_instruction.target: Image element within the article content
action_instruction.expected_outcome: At least one photograph, diagram, or illustration is visible in the body of the article.

steps.description: Confirm that an infobox summarizing key details appears

action_instruction.description: Confirm that an infobox summarizing key details appears
action_instruction.target: Infobox on the right side of the article page
action_instruction.expected_outcome: An infobox with a title (e.g., “Artificial intelligence”) and summary fields is visible.

steps.description: Assess the overall layout and styling of the article

action_instruction.description: Assess the overall layout and styling of the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The article content is well-organized with consistent font styling, clear section separations, and professional formatting.
